title: Question:
author: Rruchi man
content: Quick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?I will prefer to get direct cash rewards but at the same time those rewards should not be tied to any wagering requirements. Since it's a physical casino, means i can walk out of the casino with my cash.   Wagering requirements are usually in online casinos. So if it was an online casino, i may have prefer free spins and tried my luck.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: It'd projably depend on the site. If it's just a slots site then it'd make sense to give users free spins (you can probably pay less to give them more goes at them then too).If it had other things like live/table games and you wanted to let them gamble on everything then I think cash makes more sense.

comments.author: kovaltaras
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino https://hacking-games.ru/ to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?For me, it all depends on how lucrative bonuses provided by the casino and how long I play in this casino. If it is a new casino then I will choose money and if it is a casino like Cat Casino  then I will choose bonuses. Just because it's very profitable here with bonuses, I still withdraw money afterwards, but usually more than I could have withdrawn. But bad luck happens too, it's gambling.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?Cash reward of course so that I can have an option to try different games using the cash reward. Free spin is only limited to a single slot game which is very hard to take profit especially when the free spin is just small. With cash reward, I can use it on sportsbook to bet on low odds bet to  guarantee my profit.But all this welcome bonus has a wagering requirements which always be the major turn off to claim on any of this kind of bonus.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: I vote for free spins because the direct cash promotion are only given for small amount money, while free spins usually we get 10x-20x depends on the casino. When playing slots I always happy when I get many scatter, so I can get free spins and if I'm very lucky I will hit another scatter that would make my spins will keep continue. Also based on my experience, I have better luck to play free spins promotion than the direct cash.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: For being practical, I think direct deposit is best but having free spins that you don't have control over is fine too. The thing with free spins is that you still gambling when in fact you want someone to keep your rewards like money or something like cryptocurrency (e.g. Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc.)

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?I prefer both, be it a free spin or direct cash. But if the free spin will have more reward, I mean higher reward, I will prefer the free spin. Free spin can also get me luck and I may win more amount of money, but it can be other way too though.But to be sincere, this is not what I can consider, even all reward I have been given before are either free spin or an amount that I can not withdrawal directly, that I would still have to bet with it and win up to certain amount before I can withdraw.

comments.author: Ararbermas
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose? well as always i preferred to try my luck and assuming that i can win more without putting my own money on the platform. Lol actually when I'm newbie i used to do that and sad to say until now, where in i don't know why or maybe because it's not mine and its totally free? For short no regrets afterwards what will gonna happen on it, just the fact that at same time I'm enjoying the free money while gambling. No stress.

comments.author: virasisog
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as an incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?I would personally prefer free spins to try my luck on their site. I think that will be a good starting opportunity to try out the service that they could provide which will help me decide if I would stay on their site or not. I also like direct cash but I think free spins would be worth the risk for I won't be using my personal funds as a starting capital.

comments.author: D ltr
comments.body: If it's a slot game I'll just choose free spins because I really hope I get luck without a big deposit to start the existing roundsbut cash can also be an alternative choice in other gamesThe point is that any introductory gift will definitely have its own impression on newcomers

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?You believe that in casinos especially slot games, based on luck.Each gambling site varies and has different and same choices with players, not all gambling sites if you bet free spins, and deposits have absolute wins and luck.• The first option, sometimes betting free spins can be doubled and vice versa.• The second option, Deposit is also the same as the first option.Bottom line: the luck of the day is on your side and the bad day is on your side.I mean, these two things I definitely like, I will definitely choose both depending on the online gambling site I bet on, sometimes I've tried in slot games, using the free spins option I managed to win, I also happened to have been to the deposit option and lost.

comments.author: Mahanton
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?For sure i would be choosing Free spins.Why? With those free spins then you could really potentially able to hit up possible big wins or considerable amounts but of course it wont really be an assurance.Whereas you do receive cash rewards then expect it would really be just less and too small for you to mind off if ever you do tend to receive these things since they cant just give out significant amountwhere people could really be that interested or be contented with those amounts and if you do tend to make betting out of those free money or cash then it would really be just not able to equalon the thing you had get with those free spins.You could really just able to tell directly in between two on which one would give out those good chances on making money out of free things.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?It depends but most likely I would love free spins if that number is relevant,for example 50-100 free spins in my favorite slot would be dearer to me much more than any cash related one.There are people who love cash but if I got cash I would get away thinking what if I could hit the maximum pay line in those free spins or what if I could hit the feature game more than once and during the feature to win big,that would hurt me inside and I know I would not be happy with the cash that is why I would always love free spins instead of cash rewards.

comments.author: Fortify
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?It's very unlikely that a casino will give you a direct cash reward, at least unless it's in coupon form or loaded on to a card that requires a "play through" amount to be redeemed first. In reality a new casino would love to see you get hooked and the vast majority of these free promotions are hoping to get you hooked before the money runs out. The sensible few will be the ones who capitalize on the money, potentially free drink(s) and walk out the casino with some money in their pocket. The losers are the ones who, when the freebie runs out, will start loading up their own cash and lose track of how much they have fed back in. They do make a great hook, say a group of friends walks in - some might win, others might lose more than they should and on balance the casino had the chance to empty someones bank account if they lost control.

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: I will also go for free spins, I mean it's like the norm for new casinos to give it's members a free spin to be able to test their slot games. Direct cash is good, but i doubt that fresh casinos will offer that for just visiting their site, and if yes then maybe it will be tied to some wagering bet before you can even cash it out. So I prefer free spins at least you can have the luxury of playing your games as your own phase and see how it goes for you.

comments.author: South Park
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?Not really an easy question to answer, however since I play mostly for recreational purposes then it would make more sense for me to get the free spins, that way I do not have to worry about in which other gambling game to play and I can simply concentrate in obtaining the most fun that I can, however I could understand if someone else decided they preferred the cash reward as it is a more flexible option than the free spins.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?I'll prefer to try my luck with free spins, although it could depend on how much free spins you will get, others offer like 10-20 spins but there are some casinos that offer less spins if I'm not mistaken.And I think it's good promotion because once the player experience a new slot games on them, they will definitely started to deposit to continue playing and that is one reasons why casino offer free spins in the first place. To get you hook and lose more money.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Take an example from "Stake" casino.I think is enough to get that kind of reward like "Stake" did, by the why "CHIPS" casino is doing a wheel reward while the reward can get 50-100$ for the maximum. I'm the one who get 50$, the spin is kinda realistic comparing to some casino who give a reward for the user (wheel spin).

comments.author: Google+
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on August 23, 2022, 01:49:15 PMQuick question, on your first visit to a casino to play slots, you were offered a bonus reward as incentive for visiting, if you are given the option to either receive your rewards in form of free spins for you to try out your luck and maybe win more, or direct cash reward, which will you choose?I think it's better to choose the free spins because I think it's more fun. with the Bonus you get maybe you will get greater luck by winning the game and also if you lose you don't regret it because this defeat is just a bonus for you. but depending on the respective principles there are those who are more interested in accepting cash deposits. But in general the bonuses given are always in the form of free spins and even then the nominal is very small, so getting a win from the free spins bonus is very difficult to happen.
